New Records: Mayank Yadav made a promising debut
Varun Chakaravarthy made an impressive comeback
Key Match Events: India bundled out Bangladesh for a below-par 127
Abhishek Sharma fell to an unfortunate run out
Sanju Samson failed to convert his start again
SKY was exceptional and displayed a show of brilliant whips and flicks
Hardik Pandya and Nitish Kumar Reddy joined hands and made sure to finish the job
Pre-Game Insights: There were no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav said they just tried to back their skills and tried to walk the talk
Najmul Hossain Shanto said that they did not start well and need to focus on strike rotation
Varun Chakaravarthy said it feels like a rebirth for him to be back in the blues
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2nd T20I will be played on 9th October, Wednesday in New Delhi at the iconic Arun Jaitley Stadium
Arshdeep Singh was the PLAYER OF THE MATCH for his brilliant bowling spell
